author: damians9495
content: Hi, Damian from Blanksquare (https://x.com/Blanksquare_io)! Is there any dedicated working group for shielded pools, private balances and wallet integrations of these? Also, regarding Kohaku wallet: how to get involved in implementing possibly alternative privacy backends there?

author: greystroke
content: That is the cap table equivalent of Herpes.
